entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 a.m. ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 15 except 9 along parts of the coast.
